algorithm_technique: Direct array access and manipulation for account operations.
problem_summary_simple: Manage bank accounts with deposit, withdraw, and transfer operations, validating each transaction.
problem_summary_technical: Implement a Bank class with O(1) operations for deposit, withdraw, and transfer using an array to store account balances.
key_insights: The core of the solution is direct manipulation of the balance array.
Account validation (existence and sufficient funds) is crucial for each operation.
The problem emphasizes efficient, constant-time operations.
